LanguageData.EggFrogUnfertilized.label: Frog egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggFrogUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized Frog egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggFrogFertilized.label: Frog egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggFrogFertilized.description: Fertilized Frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Frog. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggAlligatorFertilized.label: Alligator egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggAlligatorFertilized.description: Fertilized Alligator egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Alligator. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
